nodes.text: Refnar was a planet where the Galactic Empire defeated a band of Rebels in what was called (in Rebel circles) the "Last Stand at Refnar." Rebel fighters and transports had been present on Refnar's surface when an Imperial task force arrived, forcing the Rebels to make a run for it. Though it was considered a victory for the Empire, almost every Rebel starfighter and over 70% of their transports survived the engagement.

The battle was "Pepper" Flarestream's first command; serving as flight commander, she ordered an "over-under" formation for use in attacking the incoming TIE/LN starfighters, saving many lives despite an unexpected direct assault from the Imperial line commander's cruiser.
